title: Summoning card
data: {{Obsolete}} The Summoning card summons a [[demon]] of tier min(power/50 + 1, 5). ==History== The Summoning card appears to have been vestigal code that hasn't been included in any decks since before [[0.5]]. It was finally removed in [[0.11]]. ==See also== *[[Cards]] *[[Decks]] [[Category: Deck]]
